sentences.sContent: Gradually, though, the rhombus was tipped a little more, until 3-1-2-1-3 became 4-2-4, the system with which Brazil won the World Cup in 1958.
sentences.sContent_eng: Gradually, though, the rhombus was tipped a little more, until 3-1-2-1-3 became 4-2-4, the system with which Brazil won the World Cup in 1958.
sentences.sCn: 不过，菱形中场逐渐进一步倾斜，直到31213最后演变成了1958年巴西夺得世界杯时采用的424。

sentences.sContent: As each rhombus comprises a triangle pointing inwards and one pointing outwards, there is an interplay of effects, operating through the immaculately shaped levels, edges and angles.
sentences.sContent_eng: As each rhombus comprises a triangle pointing inwards and one pointing outwards, there is an interplay of effects, operating through the immaculately shaped levels, edges and angles.
sentences.sCn: 由于每个菱形组成一个三角形指着向内和向外指着一个，有一个相互作用的影响，通过经营形成完美的水平，边和角。

words.tran: 菱形的，[数] 斜方六面体的
菱形的；斜方形的；正交的

trans.tranOther: a shape with four equal straight sides, especially one that is not a square
